title: Gallery Configuration
description: Root gallery definition consisting of configuration metadata and an ordered list of photos.

$schema.description: Optional reference to the JSON schema that validates this document.

heroEyebrow.description: Optional eyebrow text displayed above the hero title.

heroTitle.description: Optional heading for the hero section.

heroSubtitle.description: Optional subtitle or eyebrow copy for the hero section.

heroImage.description: Optional background image for the hero.

downloadArchive.description: Optional URL or path to a ZIP archive containing all photos.

photos.description: Ordered list of photos visible in the gallery.

description.description: Optional descriptive text for the photo.

thumbnail.description: URL or path pointing to a thumbnail rendition of the photo.

full.description: URL or path pointing to the full-resolution variant of the photo.

src.description: Deprecated alias for `full`; accepted for backwards compatibility.

width.description: Pixel width of the full-resolution photo.

height.description: Pixel height of the full-resolution photo.

thumbnailWidth.description: Pixel width of the thumbnail rendition.

thumbnailHeight.description: Pixel height of the thumbnail rendition.

aspectRatio.description: Thumbnail aspect ratio (height divided by width).

orientation.description: Orientation derived from the aspect ratio.
